title: MrDuckensteins 1v1 Tourney (players drawn just before the start 5pm QLD time)
body:
Hey guys ***1v1 Tourney today 5pm QLD time***

Just letting everyone know that I will be hosting another 1v1 tourney tonight, all games streamed on my channel 
all players are randomly selected from the viewer list moments before the tourney starts (everyone has equal chance to get in)
Winner gets $25 rp

Second place $10 worth of stream currency (used to enter giveaways)
During the stream (which starts at 4pm QLD time) there will be 3x$10 rp cards given away, 1 before the tourney 1 during and also 1 after.

More info can be found here
facebook.com/MrDuckenstein
twitch.tv/mrduckenstein

If you get any questions just ask

Thanks
Duckyy!{{champion:34}}

replies.body: Did this last time, what a thrill! Very fun!
Sounds great, Ill be sure to pop in and hopefully get a spot :D
Time to break out the good ol' 1 v 1 king Amumu :){{champion:32}}
